subject: Colleges and Universities
Football (College)
Sex Crimes
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: Legal maneuvering by State Senator Jake Corman led the N.C.A.A. to roll back its original penalties against Penn State in the Jerry Sandusky molestation case.
snippet: Legal maneuvering by State Senator Jake Corman led the N.C.A.A. to roll back its original penalties against Penn State in the Jerry Sandusky molestation case.
